animeTitle: Lupin III: Honoo no Kioku - Tokyo Crisis
otherNames: Lupin III: Crisis in Tokyo, ルパン三世『炎の記憶 ~Tokyo Crisis~』
synopsis: Lupin & co. attempt to steal two face plates from millionare Michael Sizuki, thinking that they will lead to an ancient treasure when brought together. However, it soon becomes apparent that there is more behind the plates then meets the eye.
